name: ROBOY (RiverGiantGames)
description:
You've been captured and taken prisoner by the Obelisk. As you are making your escape, you stumble upon ROBOY, a small robot in need of assistance. Can you safely escort ROBOY through the Catacombs?

ROBOY is a platformer inpsired by titles such as Spelunky, Catacomb Kids, Vagante, and Dark Souls. Made for Ludum Dare 46.

Programming, Music, Design: Dylan Powell
Art, SFX, Design, Programming: Hudson Thorpe-Doubble

Has controller support!

*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*
TIP: Try rolling over spike pits!

NOTE: Game was severely limited by time in the end. We will continue to patch & update a post-jam version over the next couple weeks.

UPDATES:
2020-04-20: Fixed an impossible section in one level. Fixed enemy spawn timer.
*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*
